about_the_game:
Hi, I'm Joshicus and I spent about a month creating this
game in Aseprite and GameMaker2 before handing it over to
my friend KanjiCoder to put up here on Steam. Know that
any money you decide to give us will go toward our future
game endeavors. I hope you enjoy my simple game. Make sure
to check out the demo before you buy!

When played perfectly, this game can be completed in just
under 6 minutes. However, that feat is very very difficult.

Basically you will fail a lot.

There's no health; no lives, no saves, no continues.
There isn't even a pause button.
There are 6 levels which you will generally have to
traverse both forward and backward within the course
of a single run. Each level takes about 30 seconds to
travel across. And in-between each level there is an
automatic pause screen where you do have a chance to
collect yourself and take a break if you need.

So yeah. Check it out. The demo is just the first level
with the room transitions turned off. To unlock the whole
game throw us a few bucks and remember to take lots of deep
breaths as you fail over and over and over again.

Also!

Credit to Hewett Tsoi for their 'Alagard' font !
